text: tamara manthi te loko, je'o imana lavya che ane satkaryo karya che, allaha ta'ala vacana api cukyo che ke temane jarura dharatimam nayaba (saradara) banavase, jevi rite ke te lokone nayaba banavya hatam, je'o temana karata pahela hatam ane kharekhara temana mate te dinane majabuta kari dese, je dina temana mate tene pasanda karyo che. Ane temana bhayane santimam badali nakhase, te'o mari bandagi karase, mari sathe ko'ine bhagidara nahim therave, tyara pachi pana je loko krtaghni ane inkara karanara bane, te kharekhara vidrohi che
